December 28, 2015

A Comparison between hosting providers

Comparing prices and features for major hosting providers.

Service Provider   Plan cost   RAM   Storage   CPU  
Digital Ocean   $80 / mo   8GB   80GB SSD   4 cores  
Linode   $80 / mo   8GB   192GB SSD   6 cores  
Hostgater   $89.95/mo   2GB   120GB   2 cores  
a_small_orange   $90* /mo   6GB   150GB   6 cores  
gicwebworld A   $75 / mo   16GB   400GB   6 cores  
gicwebworld B   $70**/mo   32GB   2000GB   ——-  
*2 month discount on annual plans

** Dedicated server (Intel Xeon E3-1220 16 GB RAM), unlimited bw@1Gbps

Posted under: Hosting, Hosting providers, digital ocean, Linode
